a class to generate a CommonGoalCard from a JSON file

The CommonGoalCardUpdate class represents an update of a common goal card that can be transmitted over the network.

enumerates the possible events of the game
Coordinates
Simple auxiliary class that just contains two values, X and Y coordinates

enumerates the types of the events observable throughout the event
Game
Contains all game information dasds
GameController
the main controller for the game, that implements various methods to control the actions of the players throughout the game.

GameServer
The GameServer class represents a game server that manages the connections between nicknames and server instances.
GameUpdate
The GameUpdate class represents an update of the game state that can be transmitted over the network.
GameUpdateToFile
 
GameViewController
controller for the game_view.fxml that defines the responses to the various events in the GUI

enumerates the GUI's parts

Represents the living room of the game.

LobbyException

Record of the message
MessageEvent
enumerates the types of messages in the chat
MessageUpdate
The MessageUpdate class represents an update of a message that can be transmitted over the network.
MSEdit
This class is meant to create fake JSON games for testing purposes
NotEnoughCellsException
thrown when a column of a Bookshelf doesn't have enough cells to store the selected tiles
NumPlayersException
thrown when the number of players isn't valid

controller for the choose_numplayers_view.fxml that defines the responses to the various events

The PersonalGoalCardUpdate class represents an update of a personal goal card that can be transmitted over the network.
PickTilesException
thrown when the number of Tiles picked isn't valid
Player
Represents one player in the game
PlayerUpdate
The PlayerUpdate class represents an update of a player that can be transmitted over the network.
